Html:
Hi,

As already discussed with you Wiki Link: [discussion:231743]

I have a clarification what will the output result if we give a multiple location with same name using geocoder.

for ex : lets say location name "ABC" exists both in France and Italy.

Is it possible to show markers on both the locations if it is near by locations?

 I got the answer from ur team mentioned below

"maybe, but need to check the function which returns xml to see if it contains both places"

I have checked but not able to find the function(returns xml). can you give me the samples..

Thanks,

Arun
GetLatLngFromGeocoderUrl, you need to convert it to use xml output
